website_summaries.verdict: This comic book-making kit is something a bit different for kids who love drawing and creating.
pros: Includes all kids need to make a comic, including a blank book with cells, markers, stencils, stamps, and ink
Encourages creative thinking and storytelling skills
cons: The ink can stain so you should supervise younger kids or put down a protective sheet

customer_reviews.title: Leaked everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Kind of upset that in shipping one of the ink bottles leaked all over. I would think that since it was being shipped and not bought in store that they would be sealed and not just put in paper bags. Also, everything was set in the box a little haphazardly and the stencils were bent. Not a huge deal, but I would think that they would at least be placed between notebooks to keep them flat and nice. Overall the set is really nice. Actual decent sized wooden stamps, notebooks set up as comics already. But the packaging could've been better.
customer_reviews.author: MNelson

customer_reviews.title: One big leaky mess.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughters birthday.The ink had leaked all over in the box when opened. My grandaugher got ink all over her hands and we couldn't get it off. I was so disappointed and aggrevated that I ended up throwing the whole messy thing in the trash Don't waste your money on this mess like I just did.
customer_reviews.author: Gary McMurchy

customer_reviews.title: Ink leaked all over inside
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered with ink all over the inside of the box. Not good or acceptable. My daughter got her hands covered in ink when she opened it and it was all over other parts of the kit. So disappointing because this is a kit we have purchased from other stores and my girls very much enjoy the comics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited but the ink messed everything up. He couldn't use most of it.
customer_reviews.author: Estephanie

customer_reviews.title: Creative time!
customer_reviews.text: My son was super excited for this and thought it was so awesome when he saw everything wrapped individually in the box itself (said they were like “tiny presents”) The ink can be messy so be careful when soaking into the pad! All in all the product is great
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son LOVES this kit! He literally hugged the comic books when he opened the kit! Before buying this kit I looked though most of the comic blank DIY books that were available but loved that this kit came with stamps, stencils, markers and completely blank books! The front and back of both books are blank. The pages are super thick like card stock paper and each page has different version of squares for comic art! I was missing a marker from the kit but after contacting the company they were quick to fix the problem! Great company! Great product! Recommend for anyone who wants to create their own comics!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ink Spill
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift but unable to use because red ink was spilled all over the products and the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Branham

customer_reviews.title: Great idea! But....
customer_reviews.text: It was a cool idea but the ink leaked everywhere and stained my sons fingers for days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived leaking ink inside box
customer_reviews.text: The set would be nice and beautiful presented and wrapped if it wasn't covered in leaked ink. It arrives with yellow in leaked all over, soaked in splatters a couple of pages deep into the comic book, and in the storage box too. Also very little yellow ink remaining. I checked inside since I hadn't ordered before and was very disappointed to find the ink everywhere. It arrives this evening and was supposed to be a gift for a birthday tomorrow. It's really ungiftable and I wouldn't be fully useable if it was for personal use either since almost one of the only has gone.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bedford

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is awesome. My kids loved it. I only gave it 4 stars because the ink pads leaked everywhere when we first opened the package. Literally everywhere. It was a mess. My hands were stained trying to clean everything up. That being said though I would buy it again, it has everything you can think of to make a cool classic style comic book and my kids really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Sisia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for any occasion.
customer_reviews.text: love love love this set! All around a great product! Package is very cool plus also serves as a longterm container to keep the kit together. There are several items included, all of which were in working condition. This is the second item I have purchased from this brand and I have been really impressed with both items. Comparable to Melissa and Doug products.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Ink mess everywhere.  Do not do this in the living room.
customer_reviews.text: This product makes you put ink into the stamps on your own. As an adult it went everywhere, so you can imagine a kid doing this. The product is decent otherwise, but the ink that you have to fill is a nightmare, we're going to throw the ink pads out and just go to Target and buy some. Long story short this product isn't worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a child who is just beginning to be creative
customer_reviews.text: Liked the fact that it was a book already, had markers and stamps to help with making it a true comic book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it came with some stamps and ink pads! The books also have a nice amount of pages in it! Great for getting my kids creativity flowing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: For the kid writers and artists
customer_reviews.text: Comic book creation had everything. My kid with imagination and artistic ability had fun making own comic book. The variety included is definately a plus to expand the imagination. Nicely put together!
customer_reviews.author: Meghna Desai

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my older son and it was perfect. When his little brother's bday rolled around, I bought another. It was missing parts, so it was very disappointing on his bday morning when he opened it.
customer_reviews.author: vdeos

customer_reviews.title: Great activity box for elementary-age kids
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves this and has started working on his first comic. Only real complaint is that he wishes the stamps came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: A. G.

customer_reviews.title: You don't send this one off.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was one of the ones that you draw on the templates and send off for them to print a comic book. It's not. this one is just a blank book of squares for you to draw on.
customer_reviews.author: C. Achterberg

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice set
customer_reviews.text: I love how this kit is packaged. It’s christmas gift so my son hasn’t opened it yet but I know his imagination is going to run wild when he opens it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item to foster creativity
customer_reviews.text: Great item that includes everything needed to get started. My only complaint was that one ink bottle was leaking, but thankfully it didn't stain anything.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Creative boys’ craft.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for an 8+ boy who loves to write stories and comics. It’s hard to find crafty presents for boys, but this was perfect for my grandson. That being said, it certainly could appeal to girls who aren’t just into mermaids and unicorns!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Spector

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for comic book kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loves anime and comic books so this was a great gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good value!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I had hoped for! It is well packaged and the box is nearly filled with the supplies. I know my great-grandson is going to love it! I almost didn't buy it because of a few negative reviews, so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: premablue

customer_reviews.title: Great for creativity.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality markers but my son absolutely loves this. He has made several small practice comics on printer paper. He's saving the books that come inside for when he is "better".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and this is a great all-inclusive kit
customer_reviews.text: Grandson absolutely loves it. He is really into making comics, and this is a great all-inclusive kit!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Brumley

customer_reviews.title: The ink is a dink
customer_reviews.text: The fact that the ink comes in small bottles is frustrating. The ink bottle broke in the box upon arrival. The other ink bottles we tried to saturate the ink pads withwas also a challenge becuase the ink does not spread on the pad evenly so is will pool in one spot but wont spread through the fabric. So we did without the ink and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: amanda stanton

customer_reviews.title: My 8yo loved it
customer_reviews.text: My son led this. The only bad part is that one of the ink bottles was leaking when he opened it. Luckily it didn't get on the blank books.
customer_reviews.author: weno74

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second kit and my kiddo loves it! Glad it comes with more parts and pieces than other similar products and so easy to open and store all in one box!
customer_reviews.author: jamie allen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 7 year old Nephew. The box came right away and had everything it said it would in the description. I was very pleased with how it was packed, no ink was spilled out like some of the other reviews. Everything came individually wrapped. I think this gift will be perfect for my Nephew to use his imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!! 😍
customer_reviews.text: Great gift or Just for kids who Love creating comics/stories/drawing. Gave it to My 9yr old as apart of his Xmas gift. It was a hit, that it actually took him off his electronics to do and actually want to stop to do this. This lets them use there creativity and imagination, away from being a zombie from games to excercise his mind...
customer_reviews.author: Angela G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old likes it very much... stars based on his opinion, but it is a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Slava

customer_reviews.title: Love this concept
customer_reviews.text: would have given a better rating if ink pads were better and didn't leak
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter is really enjoying this. She loves to write and be creative.
customer_reviews.author: stacy d

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a child to draw and imagine.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect gift for a child who likes to draw color and make up their own stories. It's Spurs the imagination
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: My niece loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas for my 11 year old niece who is obsessed with comics. This was her favorite gift she got.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality! Great assortment of materials to encourage kids' creativity!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: Stamps are great! Kids loved it! Very old school comic look
customer_reviews.author: abbie

customer_reviews.title: Way cool but messy
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit. You have to put ink into the ink pads though so it can make a HUGE mess
customer_reviews.author: Pixidonut

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This is ridiculous my baby opened her gift and this is what I get.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great all the way around
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to draw!!! And this was a complete package for his gift. The stamps were all included as well as ink in many colors. He has used it and developed his own comic book! Great gift for the future artist.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney York

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome gift, it has made my kid very happy. It is also encouraging her to write more.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Wood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it and we will be buying another one in the future
customer_reviews.author: nlong

customer_reviews.title: Ink spilled
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two boxes for each of my daughters. One box the ink spilled inside the box. And the other box arrived fine.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Damaged kit
customer_reviews.text: The kit arrived damaged. The orang ink was broken and one of the booklets has orange ink on all of the inside pages. Looks great otherwise but we are disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: lior galili

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit! The kids have had so much fun creating their own comics.
customer_reviews.author: Nellygirl

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: My son just opened his Christmas present and loves everything in this kit, BUT we didn’t receive the bottles of ink for his stamps. Obviously something I can easily replace but... they should have been included.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A. Hayden

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the story telling artistic kid in your life
customer_reviews.text: got as a gift for my little sister who loves drawing and making her own comics. box is cute and the contents give you so much creative freedom
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that encourages creativity in kids!
customer_reviews.author: W. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to make a great comic!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7yo son for Christmas and he absolutely loved it! Lots of great supplies to use
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Durable Comic Books
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. Great options for making a comic with durable books. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: My 9yo son loves this. Has everything you need for making comics.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Everything as expected. Bought it as a gift - great success.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Tsukernik

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter says she enjoys making her own comics with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came ruined - should have checked!
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this gift for my son. I bought early when I came across it on amazon, and when he opened it for his birthday (over 30 days later) one of the bottles of ink was unsealed and had leaked all over the contents of the box. Boo! Couldn't be replaced because it was past 30 days. Such a frustration and disappointment. It looks like it would have been a great kit.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves to draw and this was the perfect gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Ninva

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Working great for my nephew . He love this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Blackwidow442

product_meta.title: Kid Made Modern Comic Book Kit - Kids Craft Kit, Storytelling for Kids
feature_bullets: DIY COMIC BOOK FOR KIDS - Our Comic Book Kit has everything you need to create your own hilarious misadventures or epic superhero stories
FOR YOUR LITTLE STORYTELLER - Our Comic Book Kit is perfect for the kid who is obsessed with childrens graphic novels. Endless possibilities to design their own colorful comic book
FOSTER THEIR CREATIVITY & IMAGINATION - Your budding storyteller will have plenty of room to explore & customize their own 24-page blank comic book
BIRTHDAY OR HOLIDAY GIFT - An inspiring gift encouraging creativity. Includes: blank comic book, markers, stencil templates, rubber stamps, ink pads, & a storage box
FUN FOR AGES 6 & UP - Great time to explore their self expression in a safe place. Endless possibilities without boundaries and limitations of creativity

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars285 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
